Package com.github.dkharrat.nexusdata.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ObjectContextNotifier.ObjectContextListener
    Defines the interface which ObjectContext listeners must implement to receive notifications of relevant events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AtomicStore
    An AtomicStore is a persistence store in which data is loaded and saved all at once.
    ChangedObjectsSet
    Represents a set of objects that have changed in an ObjectContext.
    FetchRequest<T extends ManagedObject>
    Describes query to the persistence store to retrieve all the objects that match the specified criteria.
    FetchRequest.Builder<T extends ManagedObject>
    A builder class that simplifies the creation of a FetchRequest.
    IncrementalStore
    An IncrementalStore represents a persistence store in which data is loaded or saved incrementally as needed.
    ManagedObject
    A managed object is the base type of any object instance in Nexus Data.
    ObjectContext
    An Object Context keeps track and manages a collection of objects used by an application.
    ObjectContextNotifier
    This is a singleton class used to register for notifications from ObjectContext events, such as inserted objects, changed objects, etc.
    ObjectContextNotifier.DefaultObjectContextListener
    Provides a default empty implementation of the ObjectContextNotifier.ObjectContextListener.
    ObjectID
    An ObjectID represents a global identifier that uniquely identifies a ManagedObject.
    ObjectsChangedNotification
    Represents the event that is sent when a set of objects in an ObjectContext have changed.
    PersistentStore
    A PersistentStore represents the data store where the object graph is persisted.
    PersistentStoreCoordinator
    A PersistentStoreCoordinator is a mediator between a ObjectContext and other PersistentStores.
    SaveChangesRequest
    Represents a save request to a persistence store, containing all the objects that have been changed, either by insertion, deletion, or updating, and are to be reflected in the persistence store.
    SortDescriptor
    This class describes how elements within a collection are sorted.
    StoreCacheNode
    Represents the data cache for a single record in the persistent store.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoSuchPropertyException
    This exception is thrown when a non-existent property is accessed.
